dream.title: Dreaming of Creating Your Own 3D Figurine?
dream.description: We offer printing of various 3D figures of your choice. From plastic parts for cars and various machinery to decorations and miniatures from games, movies, or your imagination.

picture1.title: Modeling
picture1.description: You send your idea, and we create the 3D model.

picture2.title: 3D Printing
picture2.description: We send the prepared model for printing.

picture3.title: Ready
picture3.description: Painting and preparing the model for shipment.

picture1.title: We provide consultation throughout all stages of the process.

material1.title: PLA
material1.description: One of the most popular plastics. Eco-friendly, biodegradable, and biocompatible. Widely used for creating toys, souvenirs, and disposable items.

material2.title: ABS
material2.description: Plastic used in engineering. Has high impact resistance, mechanical strength, and rigidity. Ensures product durability and allows for restoration.

material3.title: PET-G
material3.description: High-strength, wear-resistant material with a high melting point and is completely non-toxic and safe. Widely used for creating household items, from tableware to containers for storing chemicals.
